original: 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs /
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs /
translated: Mañjuśrī Sādhana

original: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble Mañjuśrī.

original: 'jam dpal sgrub thabs rnam dag pa //
analyzed: 'jam dpal sgrub thabs rnam dag pa //
translated: The pure Mañjuśrī Sādhana,

original: bsdu shing shin tu gsal ba yis //
analyzed: bsdu shing shin tu gsal ba yis //
translated: Collected and very clearly stated,

original: mi shes rab rib 'joms mdzad pa //
analyzed: mi shes rab rib 'joms mdzad pa //
translated: Destroys the darkness of ignorance,

original: yid 'ong legs par brjod par bya //
analyzed: yid 'ong legs par brjod par bya //
translated: Delightful, is well-stated.

original: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'dir rang gi snying gar zla ba la m'u:yig ser po yongs su gyur pa las 'jam dpal gzhon nu zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
analyzed: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas 'dir rang gi snying gar zla ba la m'u:yig ser po yongs su gyur pa las 'jam dpal gzhon nu zhal gsum phyag drug pa /
translated: Here, by the previously described method, on one's heart, on a moon, is a yellow mūṃ syllable, which transforms into youthful Mañjuśrī with three faces and six arms.

original: sku mdog gur gum ltar dmar ba dang / sngon po dang dkar po ni g-yas dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
analyzed: sku mdog gur gum ltar dmar ba dang / sngon po dang dkar po ni g-yas dang cig shos kyi zhal lo //
translated: His body is red like saffron, and the right and left faces are blue and white.

original: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: He sits in the sattva posture.

original: ral gri dang / mda' dang / mchog sbyin dang ldan pa ni g-yas kyi phyag gsum na'o //
analyzed: ral gri dang / mda' dang / mchog sbyin dang ldan pa ni g-yas kyi phyag gsum na'o //
translated: In the three right hands he holds a sword, arrow, and boon-granting gesture.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang / autpa la dang / gzhu dang ldan pa ni phyag g-yon pa gsum na'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po ti dang / autpa la dang / gzhu dang ldan pa ni phyag g-yon pa gsum na'o //
translated: The three left hands hold a volume of the Perfection of Wisdom, a blue lotus, and a bow.

original: gzhon nu sgeg pa dang bcas shing rgyan dang na bza' la sogs pas brgyan pa /
analyzed: gzhon nu sgeg pa dang bcas shing rgyan dang na bza' la sogs pas brgyan pa /
translated: He is a youth, with a flirtatious manner, adorned with ornaments, garments, and so forth.

original: me tog sna tshogs pas cher mdzes pa /
analyzed: me tog sna tshogs pas cher mdzes pa /
translated: He is very beautiful with various flowers.

original: zur phud gsum gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: zur phud gsum gyis brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with three locks of hair.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdul phra rab las yongs su grub pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdul phra rab las yongs su grub pa'i bdag nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on him as having the nature of being completely made of the atoms of the Tathāgatas.

original: aom m'u:zhes @121b pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: aom m'u:zhes @121b pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
translated: One should recite the mantra Oṃ mūṃ.

original: 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Mañjuśrī is complete.
